\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 9946}

\subsection*{Don't Waste Your Money}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Herbal Ectasy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Herbal Ecstasy & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 190.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

I was at a pipe/head shop and I seen an advertisement for something called `Herbal Ectasy'.  I asked the employee at the store what exactly where they. He showed me and told me about them. I figured for $\sim$\$6 what the hell.  I took the recommended dosage.  I took about an hour for me to feel an effects of them. To say the least I was really disappointed with them.  They just made my body feel really sensitive to the touch, like popped some niacin.  It was at no `buzz' at all. They just made me feel sick, although I didn't puke.  I ate some food and I felt better after that.  If you want my recommendation, don't waste your money or use it on something that is going to give you something in return.

\end{document}
